segments.text: Were you able to contact the owners about my counter-offer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please have a seat , and we ’ ll discuss this right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope that they accepted the counter-offer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The counter-offer was acceptable to them , but they want you to pay for the home inspection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will the home inspection cost me a lot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It can cost as little as five hundred dollars and as much as one thousand dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it my choice as to who inspects this house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is your choice as you are paying for it . Make a wise investment and choose the best inspector you can find .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long until you contact the sellers with my acceptance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s call them right now . I am sure that they will be happy to hear that you have agreed to pay for the inspection .
segments.speaker: S2
